snippet: David Wildstein is now the wild card in the scandal surrounding Gov. Chris Christie and the revenge-closings of lanes leading to the George Washington Bridge in September.
abstract: Former Port Authority official David Wildstein is now the wild card in scandal surrounding New Jersey Gov Chris Christie and the revenge-closings of lanes leading to the George Washington Bridge in September 2013; on his blog, ex-ally to Christie showed his approach to politics and much about his motivations and strategy now.
lead_paragraph: David Wildstein is now the wild card in the scandal surrounding Gov. Chris Christie and the revenge-closings of lanes leading to the George Washington Bridge in September.

headline.main: On Blog, an Ex-Christie Ally Showed Approach to Politics
headline.print_headline: On Blog, an Ex-Christie Ally Showed Approach to Politics
